column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=University student says : " Hmm ... I 've never seen any sandbenders or nomads around here .
#Text=And which of your professors could we ask about the war with the Fire Nation ?
#Text=" University student says : " Uh ... " University student says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I 'm not a political science student ... I 've got to get to class .
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " Well , I 'm sorry no one has seen your bison .
#Text=Why do n't you go get some rest ?
#Text=Someone will be over with dinner , later .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , come with me .
#Text=" Pong says : " You 're the Avatar !
#Text=I heard you were in town .
#Text=I 'm Pong .
#Text=" Aang says : " Nice to meet you , Pong .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , Pong , what 's goin ' on with this city ?
#Text=Why is everyone here so scared here to talk about the war ?
#Text=" Pong says : " War ?
#Text=Scared ?
#Text=What do you mean ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I can feel you shaking .
#Text=" Pong says : " Look , I 'm just a minor government official .
#Text=I 've waited three years to get this house .
#Text=I do n't want go get into trouble .
#Text=" Katara says : " Get in trouble with who ?!
#Text=" Pong says : " Shh , listen , you ca n't mention the War here .
#Text=And whatever you do , stay away from the Dai Li .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Would you like a pot of tea ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " We 've been working in a tea shop all day !
#Text=I 'm sick of tea !
#Text=" Iroh says : " " Sick of tea ? "
#Text=That 's like being sick of breathing !
#Text=Have you seen the spark rocks to heat up the water ?
#Text=" Jet says : " They 're not there .
#Text=You 'll have to firebend , old man .
#Text=Where 're you going ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I borrowed our neighbors ' .
#Text=Such kind people .
#Text="
